    Protobuf type opencannabis.structs.pricing.PercentageDiscount
    PricingDescriptor
    Specifies a descriptor for product pricing, which specifies the price configuration for one independent price tier in a given set of pricing tiers for a product.
    PricingDescriptor.Builder
    Specifies a descriptor for product pricing, which specifies the price configuration for one independent price tier in a given set of pricing tiers for a product.
    PricingTierAvailability
    Specifies availability and stock status flags for a particular pricing tier.
    PricingTierAvailability.Builder
    Specifies availability and stock status flags for a particular pricing tier.
    ProductDiscount  
    ProductPricing
    Pricing manifest for a product, with the combined tiers and top-level discounts that are currently configured for a given sellable material or unit of merchandise.
    ProductPricing.Builder
    Pricing manifest for a product, with the combined tiers and top-level discounts that are currently configured for a given sellable material or unit of merchandise.
    ProductPricingSpec  
    SaleDescriptor
    Protobuf type opencannabis.structs.pricing.SaleDescriptor
    SaleDescriptor.Builder
    Protobuf type opencannabis.structs.pricing.SaleDescriptor
    UnitPricingDescriptor
    Specifies pricing information for a unit-priced product, including the price value, tier status, and any discounts that currently apply.
    UnitPricingDescriptor.Builder
    Specifies pricing information for a unit-priced product, including the price value, tier status, and any discounts that currently apply.
    WeightedPricingDescriptor
    Specifies pricing information for a weight-priced product, at a particular weight tier, including the price value, tier status, and, optionally, a custom weight.
    WeightedPricingDescriptor.Builder
    Specifies pricing information for a weight-priced product, at a particular weight tier, including the price value, tier status, and, optionally, a custom weight.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Grow
    Enumerates common/known types or styles of cultivation that might produce a flower for sale, or resale after manufacture.
    PricingDescriptor.TierCase  
    PricingType
    Enumerates supported pricing schemes.
    PricingWeightTier
    Enumerates supported pricing tiers, when the 'WEIGHTED' pricing scheme is in effect.
    ProductFlag
    Flags that may be applied to an entire product entry, that govern how an independent product and all of its variants or sub-products are processed or treated.
    SaleDescriptor.SaleCase  
    SaleType
    Protobuf enum opencannabis.structs.pricing.SaleType
    Shelf
    Enumerates available 'shelf' entries, for use in retail contexts, to indicate the quality of a particular product entry (usually flowers).
    Species
    Enumerates known cannabis species, that may be applied to products to indicate their general genetic and pharmacokinetic traits.
